title: MEMS Devices
description: Introduces fundamental concepts and tools needed for the design, simulation and analysis of MEMS devices.  These include electrical, mechanical, radiant, thermal, magnetic and chemical domains.  Credit not allowed for both CHBE 6460 and ME 6460 or ECE 6460.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 6229 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 6229 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
